neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: ABIS Sample Java
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: ABIS sample application demonstrates how to use SDK with biometrical systems that requires identifying fingerprints, palmprints, faces or irises using server, cluster server functionality or identifying in the local database. It allows to enroll or match fingerprints, palmprints, face or iris images (depending on SDK) within chosen database. Latent fingerprint editing, fingerprint slap segmentation is available in this sample. This sample demonstrates working with Accelerator too.
